name: Escaped Plague
description:
After a series of experiments, something went wrong. The government spread by mistake a plague which is taking over the world, transforming people into blood thirsted monsters.

You play as Belial, one of the first experiments. Half corrupted but still able to think and act under your own command.

After surviving the experiments you promised to yourself that you will save as many lives as possible, killing every creature that would enter any village you'll visit.

Since that day you travelled a lot, village after village, slaying monsters and raising those few Chronorium coins that you need to live. 

Belial, the survivor.
